description.text: It provides §creflections, §broughness, §aemissive light §fto your world with the same originial look of Minecraft, but in better.

compatibility.text: This resource pack only works on §aNVIDIA RTX §fcards.

warning.text: This version of the pack is still in early developpement. You can deal with §cbugs §fwhile playing the game.

Q1.text: Q: From who are the normals map textures ?

A1.text:
§7A: Most of the normal maps textures are from a Java Edition pack called "Vanilla-Normals-Renewed-1.12" by Poudingue:
https://short-d.com/r/3Mk0

Q2.text: Q: Will the texture pack be updated to newer version ?

A2.text:
§7A: Of course i will, by the way, if you want to support me.
Donate on Paypal: https://paypal.me/mazewave
